EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal Partner Days_2017.Austin SI Beginner Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Partner Days - Austin - Feb. 23rd, 2017 | Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Partner Days in Austin.
We look forward to hosting you at our partner event. Your event confirmation details can be found below:
What: Pivotal Partner Days: SI - Beginner Track Date & Time: February 21-23, 2017 Location: VMware, 3900 N Capital of Texas Hwy, Suite 500, Austin, TX 78746
The event will begin promptly at 11:00am. Please arrive 15 minutes early to sign in.
Remember to bring your laptops!
If you have any questions please contact Cameron Stewart (cstewart@pivotal.io) or Andrew Mackenzie (amackenzie@pivotal.io).
Thanks and we look forward to seeing you in Austin!
- Pivotal Partner Alliances Team
